issue.title: [GitHub] Improve "How to contribute patches"
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2907](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2907). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The first paragraph of the document "[How to contribute patches](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#how-to-contribute-patches)" is unclear that contributors need to follow the procedure "To contribute patch".

I will add a patch for this.
